{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Guillemot |model=Hercules HWNAP-300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/26/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=NAM5061156 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Hercules |default_ssid_regex=^Hercules$ |default_ip=192.168.2.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Hercules Wireless N Access Point''
[http://www.hercules.com/uk/wifi/bdd/p/90/hercules-wireless-n-access-point-hwnap-300-/ Product page]
[ftp://ftp.hercules.com/wifi/manuals/HWNAP-300/01-eng_Hercules_Wireless_N_Access_Point.pdf Manual] "1244-00000548-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''Hercules'''. The default WiFi Manager N password is 123456.
